t1:
Our team
One for all. All for you!
t2: There are many good reasons for deciding in favour of Green Wind’s project development. Each member of our team is a good reason. And all together, we are more than the sum of individuals.

team.name: Martin Kühl
team.bio: involved in the wind power business since 1995 and is fascinated by the power of the wind.

team.name: Manuel Lasse
team.bio: with an eye for the big picture and a view of the future.

team.name: Franziska Göbel
team.bio: with perseverance and creativity for successful approval.

team.name: Christian Kandora
team.bio: with the experience and dedication to optimise wind farm layouts.

team.name: Sophie Kolb
team.bio: always curious and totally committed to environmentally friendly energy.

team.name: Dietmar Mahler
team.bio: in personal contact with the people on-site.

team.name: Ulrich Mertens
team.bio: so that the objectives of the energy transition are achieved.

team.name: Bernd Müller
team.bio: with enthusiasm and commitment to the  interests of land owners.

team.name: Jasmin Eichner
team.bio: with a fresh outlook and the right attitude.

team.name: Anne Pfannes
team.bio: with a meticulous sense for figures and new ideas.

team.name: Iris Gärtner
team.bio: for efficiency – at work and in energy use.
